analysis.description:
ERC721 (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#329-344) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#344)

DungeonToken (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#351-570) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#481-492)

HeroToken (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#579-760) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):

DungeonToken._transfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#445-474) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- fromTokens[i] == _tokenId

DungeonChallenge._getFirstHeroGenesAndInitialize (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#1026-1045) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- heroTokenContract.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

DungeonChallenge._getFirstHeroGenesAndInitialize (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#1026-1045) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- heroTokenContract.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0
DungeonTraining._train (/unique_chucks/9/0x24d530c0e939f665e535f30d3858c1c3283e8d28.sol#1137-1177) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- heroTokenContract.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0
